name: Home_Styles_Barnside_Metro_5-Tier_Shelf
reviews: This shelf is very nice. It looks just like the picture. Very sturdy. It is not hard to put together but it takes quite a while, there are lots of screws. The color is medium to dark wood tone with a slight gray wash over top of that but more wood than gray. I was surprised that it did not come with a strap to secure it to the wall because it is so tall. Ours is going on carpet so it feels a little wonky, we will have to come up with something to secure it to the wall just to be sure it doesn't topple over.
We got our shelf last week and are quite happy with it. Good value for money.
Super sturdy and looks awesome in our living room. Shelves are thick and support a lot of weight. We bought two.
A little annoying to put together but once finished - its a beautiful, sturdy bookshelf.
description:
The Barnside Metro 5-Tier Shelf by Home Styles exhibits an alluring
industrialized design that displays mixed media materials. The look
is achieved by employing a wire brush technique with a driftwood
finish. Each shelf features five (5) shelvesMiddle two (2) shelves are adjustableReclaimed wood styleFinish and measurements may vary slightlyMaterials: Powder-coated metal and pine veneersFinish: DriftwoodDimensions: 76 inches high x 38 inches wide x 15.75 inches
